name: Scattery Game
description:
As a junior hitman you want to train your skills. Shoot all blue blocks and set a new high score. Join a league and play worldwide.

In game controls --> Rotate view with mouse click and move, or keys WASD. Shoot a marble with mouse click.   

1. Click on profile and choose a nickname (e.g. "alice") and optionally a league (e.g. "world" or whatever) to compete with other players.

2. Click "start" to enter the level menu

3. Click "<" and ">" to scroll through the levels and their high scores

3. Click on "play" to start the game

4. Try to beat the highest score of each level.  Clear each level by dropping all blue blocks. The different block colors give (or cost) a different amount of points. But beware: each marble shot costs 5 points.

5. Click ↻ to restart the level

5. Click X to exit the level and return to the level menu where you can see the high scores
